name: GetShopsByProximity
description:
Returns stores in proximity of a set of coordinates.

If `ProductID` and `HasStock` is set, only the stores with stock for that product will be returned.

properties.name: HasStock
properties.description: Filter only stores with available stock

properties.name: Limit
properties.description: Amount of stores to return, defaults to setting `GetShopsByProximityDefaultLimit` / 10

properties.name: Range
properties.description: Range around the coordinates to look for shops, in meters, defaults to setting `DefaultShopProximityRange` / 50_000
